clinical_study.brief_title: Health Related Quality of Life and Cognitive Function Among Norwegian Dialysis Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Health Related Quality of Life and Cognitive Function Among Norwegian Dialysis Patients, a Cross-Sectional Study

lead_sponsor.agency: Norwegian University of Science and Technology

clinical_study.source: Norwegian University of Science and Technology

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to assess health related quality of life and its predictors among chronic dialysis patients and to assess cognitive function using 3 different tests.

study_pop.textblock: Patients with end-stage renal disease and in active dialysis treatment in the Norwegian county of Sør-Trøndelag.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Chronic kidney failure
- Active dialysis treatment
- Aged over 18 years
- Able to read and answer the quality of life questionaire
Exclusion Criteria:
